Class MBFImageRenderer

  • java.lang.Object

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContourRenderer

    public class MBFImageRenderer
extends MultiBandRenderer<Float,MBFImage,FImage>
    ImageRenderer for MBFImage images.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
